attributes.action: oppose the setting up a database of people's personal information
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC reports that the government is considering creating a giant Whitehall database of people's personal details. This truly is Big Brother and this proposal, if true, should be fought vehemently

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
